author: greenmedinfo
title: Fu brick tea alleviates high fat induced non-alcoholic fatty liver disease.
text:
[Fu brick tea alleviates high fat induced non-alcoholic fatty liver disease.](/article/fu-brick-tea-alleviates-high-fat-induced-non-alcoholic-fatty-liver-disease) - GreenMedInfo Summary
Fu brick tea alleviates high fat induced non-alcoholic fatty liver disease by remodeling the gut microbiota and liver metabolism.
Front Nutr. 2022 ;9:1062323. Epub 2022 Dec 22. PMID:
36618677
Yan Tang
Fu brick tea (FBT) and its extracts have good lipid-lowering effects and have been used in the treatment of obesity in previous studies. Unfortunately, the therapeutic effect of FBT on non-alcoholic fatty liver disease (NAFLD) has not been thoroughly studied. In this study, we explored the mechanism by which FBT alleviates NAFLD from the perspective of the gut microbiota and liver metabolites. The results showed that FBT could reduce the body weight, liver weight and abdominal fat of NAFLD mice, and improve liver pathological morphology, liver lipid deposition, blood lipids and liver function. Moreover, FBT improved the diversity of the gut microbiota and changed the profile of liver metabolism in NAFLD mice. Further studies showed that FBT could ameliorate the cecum barrier, and regulate the effects of factors related to lipid synthesis in the cecum and liver of NAFLD mice. In conclusion, the present study confirmed that FBT can alleviate high fat induced NAFLD by regulating the homeostasis of the gut microbiota and liver metabolites.
[Black Tea : CK(745) : AC(176)](/substance/black-tea) [Gastrointestinal Agents : CK(3145) : AC(843)](/pharmacological-action/gastrointestinal-agents), [Hepatoprotective : CK(5098) : AC(2264)](/pharmacological-action/hepatoprotective)

author: oliver7
title: #33 La Facultad de Ciencias de la Información de la Complutense confirma que Vito Quiles miente y no es licenciado en periodismo
text:
Portada
mis comunidades
otras secciones
[#5](c5#c-5) Es cloaquero porque miente más que habla, y lo hace para enfangar.
Y me disgusta el nombre, porque la gente que trabaja en las cloacas hace un trabajo muy digno y necesario.
#_2 Si el encargado de prensa de un político alardea de licenciatura y resulta que es mentira es un escándalo y debería dimitir de cualquier relación politica que pueda tener.
Para otro día dejamos que un señor que quiere vivir de paguitas públicas le vacile al empresario que ha montado un medio de comunicación, porque tiene cachindeíto.
Anda que no hay gente que NO termina la carrera y luego se cuelgan medallas como si la hubieran terminado.
En mi opinión, cuando es alguien muy conocido debería ser algo que se pueda consultar públicamente. Veo bien que tener un título pueda ser algo privado, que no se pueda saber si tienes X o Y titulación si no lo dices tú, pero una vez lo dices, no veo mal que se pueda consultar, sobre todo en casos como este donde la persona es muy conocida.
Es tan mentiroso que si le das un reloj y le quita las pilas, este no llegaría dar la hora correcta dos veces al día.
En realidad aunque tuviera el título (la facultad dice que no), tampoco sería periodista.
Alvise es un tentetieso para salir de Ayuso. Me dan ganas de votar cada noticia de Alvise SPAM a partir de ahora.
[#17](c17#c-17) A ver, que ya sabíamos que le comías los huevos a pagascal con absoluta efusividad, no hacía falta que te retratases aún más.
Qué grande el excoletas por haber retratado a toda la escoria fascista, aplastapobres y vendepatrias de este país. Todavía se sabe que escuece viendo que tienen a bastardos malpagados defendiendo lo indefendible por doquier. Son tan tiernos.
Pues hay que ser muy lerdo, negado, para no acabar la carrera de periodismo, esas carreras de pintar y colorear; Si me dijeras una carrera de ciencias, quizás.
Mira que no valer ni pa eso.
Además de mentiroso es que es subnormal: la figura del licenciado hace años que no existe. En todo caso sería graduado. Es más, lo pone en la banda.
Está claro que se hizo la foto de graduación con créditos pendientes y ahora va de que ha terminado la carrera.
[#25](c25#c-25) Estamos delante del nuevo alfa español, una serie de seres supremos que tienen tanta poca imaginación que copian un símbolo como el de la mascara de Guy Fawkes. Incapaces de decir una verdad, usan los miles de bots repartidos en varios continentes para que les den la razón, creando mierda y odio allá por donde van.
Bueno, quizás haya acabado las asignaturas que le acababan en Mayo o Junio...
La prueba que dice la chavala resentida esta de que está matriculada con ella no me parece que signifique mucho a estas alturas del año.
Que el colegio le pida cuentas a él por decir que es Periodista sin serlo, si es que es así.
Pero no sé porque tanto revuelo, la verdad, es periodismo, ni que fuese una carrera de ciencias.
[#4](c4#c-4) bueno, pero eso también aplica a muchos de los que a día de hoy ya tienen el titulo. Incluso a muchos que llevan décadas con el titulo
[#10](c10#c-10) además, esa afirmación la dijo Pablo Iglesias sí, pero estando soltero, sin hijos, sin mercenarios de la derecha amenazando a su familia.
Como mínimo, una persona de "bien" con un mínimo de razonamiento, se daría cuenta que una afirmación así estando soltero, no se puede mantener cuando estas en pareja, o formando una familia, porque esa decisión ya no es sólo tuya.
Por lo tanto, solo un necio puede llamar hipócrita a Pablo Iglesias por no seguir viviendo en Vallecas.

author: Jared Harris
title: Police Investigating After 13-Year-Old Basketball Player Is Recorded Stomping Opponent's Head Mid-Game
text:
News
Police Investigating After 13-Year-Old Basketball Player Is Recorded Stomping Opponent's Head Mid-Game
Police have opened an investigation after a violent attack at a youth basketball game was captured on camera.
In the video, a player, identified as a 13-year-old boy, was seen stomping the head of an opposing boy who had fallen to the ground.
The Sunday game was a match between the Filipino-American youth team Tumakbo United and Payton’s Place in Alameda, California.
The video started with a Tumakbo United player receiving the ball.
A Payton’s Place player then collided with him, grabbing his jersey and bringing them both down. A short scramble for the ball turned into a scuffle between the two downed players.
Another Payton’s Place player was then seen approaching the downed Tumakbo teen from behind.
The approaching player raised his right foot high above the victim and appeared to throw the full weight of his body into that foot as it slammed into the other boy’s head, making him go completely limp on the floor.
A referee immediately intervened and grabbed the attacker, creating distance from the victim.
A video of the incident can be seen
here. (WARNING: The linked video contains graphic content.)
According to
KTVU-TV, the Alameda Police Department confirmed that it is currently investigating the incident.
Authorities said both boys were listed as 13 years old in the incident report, but other information about the case is being kept quiet because of the age of those involved.
The incident left the downed Tumakbo player with heath problems he is still dealing with.
“You could clearly see the size of his shoe on his face,” the victim’s mother Eva Guingab told
KGO-TV. “My son suffered a concussion for the first time he played basketball.”
The Guingab family said the child is in concussion protocol after the injury. The incident also left the youth plagued with headaches.
The Payton’s Place player’s parents believed their son was simply defending his teammate from the Tomakbo United player.
Payton’s Place put out a statement shortly after the recorded incident began to gain traction online.
“There is footage circulating of one of our team’s games this past weekend,” the sports nonprofit wrote in an
Instagram post. “Unfortunately, the footage is not a positive representation of our team and our values.
“The behavior that was exhibited by our player is not acceptable, and is being taken seriously. We do not condone violence. Our players are expected to conduct themselves with integrity on and off the court.”
KTVU reported Payton’s Place issued another statement Tuesday saying the 13-year-old behind the attack is no longer playing with Payton’s Place.
“His behavior was unexpected. We are working to assist in providing him resources to prevent this in the future,” the team announced.
“Violence has never been a part of our team. On behalf of the Payton’s Place Family, we sincerely apologize to the player injured in this incident, his family, and all those impacted.”
Truth and Accuracy
We are committed to truth and accuracy in all of our journalism.
 Read our editorial standards.

author: VNExplorer
title: Best Dan Houser Rockstar Games
text:
Best Dan Houser Rockstar Games
Dan Houser’s departure from Rockstar Games leaves behind an immense legacy of critically acclaimed games that are beloved by gamers everywhere. Houser was an integral part of Rockstar’s iconic attitude and his voice influenced the limits of absurdity and unbridled fun in their games. Rockstar Games’ most popular titles, such as Grand Theft Auto: Vice City and Red Dead Redemption , were written by Dan Houser, showcasing his deep involvement and contribution to the essence of these games. Rockstar Games has been at the forefront of the gaming industry for over two decades. They are pioneers of open-world gaming and have been pushing the limits of absurdity and unbridled fun since 1998. At the helm of some of Rockstar Games’ most popular and critically acclaimed titles is founding member Dan Houser, who established the company alongside his brother Sam Houser, as well as Gary Foreman, Terry Donovan, and Jamie King.
Related
7 Best Open-World Games That Don’t Feel Empty, Ranked It’s easy for open-world games to let their massive worlds become stale, but these titles don’t fall into that trap.
In 2020, Houser announced he would be leaving Rockstar Games, later establishing a new studio named Absurd Ventures which has announced new projects in 2023. Although Houser has taken his career away from Rockstar Games, he leaves behind an immense legacy of critically acclaimed games that are beloved by gamers everywhere. Players may not quite realize how integral Houser was to their favorite games, and how much of Rockstar’s iconic attitude was influenced by his voice.
Grand Theft Auto: Chinatown Wars Metascore: 93
Grand Theft Auto: Chinatown Wars Platform(s) PSP, iOS, Android, Nintendo DS Released 2009-03-17 Genre(s) Action-Adventure Developer(s) Rockstar Leeds, Rockstar North
Also set in GTA 4’s Liberty City, Grand Theft Auto: Chinatown Wars follows Huang Lee, who is part of the organized crime syndicate the Triad, as he attempts to retrieve a stolen sword that was gifted to him by his late father. Lee accidentally becomes caught up in a huge power struggle in the higher ranks of the syndicate.
Chinatown Wars is one of the few GTA games developed for handheld consoles, namely the Nintendo DS and PlayStation Portable. The game was written by Dan Houser alongside David Bland and is one of the highest-rated DS games on the Metacritic site.
Red Dead Redemption Metascore: 95
Red Dead Redemption Platform(s) PS3, Switch, PS4, Xbox 360 Released 2010-05-18 Genre(s) Open-World, Adventure Developer(s) Rockstar San Diego
Red Dead Redemption was released in 2010 and quickly became one of Rockstar Games’ most popular titles. It’s widely speculated to be one of the most expensive games ever made and was nominated for Game of the Year at several video game awards shows.
Dan Houser was one of three writers on the game, along with Michael Unsworth and Christian Cantamessa. The story follows outlaw John Marston as he’s blackmailed into working for the government after they kidnap his wife and child. Compared to previous Rockstar titles, Red Dead Redemption placed more outright emphasis on morality and questioned more serious themes – all of which helped garner its immense success.
Grand Theft Auto: Vice City Metascore: 95
Grand Theft Auto: Vice City Platform(s) PS2, Xbox (Original), PC, iOS, Android, macOS Released 2002-10-29 Genre(s) Action, Adventure Developer(s) Rockstar Games
In 2002, Rockstar Games released Grand Theft Auto: Vice City, which is set in 1986 and follows Tommy Vercetti as he builds an organized crime empire by acquiring different organizations across the city. Like all GTA games, Vice City draws inspiration from real-life events and themes of the 80s, including real drug epidemics.
Related
10 Ways Dan Houser’s Exit From Rockstar May Affect Grand Theft Auto 6 (& Other Video Games) Dan Houser, the co-founder of Rockstar Games with his brother Sam, recently left the company. What does this mean for GTA’s future?
Once again, Dan Houser wrote for Vice City – alongside James Worrall – which further solidifies how deeply intertwined he is with the very essence of GTA. As well as this, Houser produced (Houser was a producer/executive producer on almost all Rockstar games while in his Vice President position) and supplied some of the voice acting for the game.
Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas Metascore: 95
Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas Platform(s) PS3, PS2, Xbox (Original), Xbox 360, PC, iOS, Android, macOS Released 2004-10-26 Genre(s) Action, Adventure Developer(s) Rockstar Games
Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas is one of the most well-loved GTA games of all time. San Andreas follows CJ as he returns to the life he left behind after his mother is murdered. Once again, the game draws on real-life events of the 90s and uses dramatic satire to criticize certain aspects of American life. Brothers CJ and Sweet are among some of the most popular GTA characters.
Dan Houser wrote the game with James Worrall and DJ Pooh, and also produced it, as well as voice acting. Houser stated that the satire was “leveled at the broader weirdness of America and American consumerism and American action movies”.
Grand Theft Auto 3 Metascore: 97
Grand Theft Auto 3 Platform(s) PS2, Xbox (Original), PC, iOS, Android, macOS Released 2001-10-23 Genre(s) Action, Adventure Developer(s) Rockstar Games
Grand Theft Auto 3 is the fifth overall GTA installment, but the third main game in the series. It is the only GTA game to feature a strange and silent protagonist, which may be unexpected for fans of the franchise, since GTA is known for its morally questionable dialogue and conversational characters.
Written once again by Dan Houser, with James Worrall and Paul Kurowski, the game follows Claude as he seeks revenge against his girlfriend who left him for dead during a robbery. GTA 3 is thought to be a turning point for the open-world gaming genre and was critically acclaimed for its 3D gameplay, concepts, and world map. It’s one of the highest-rated PlayStation 2 games on the Metacritic site.
Grand Theft Auto 5 Metascore: 97
Grand Theft Auto 5 Platform(s) Xbox Series S, Xbox Series X, PS3, PS5, PS4, Xbox 360, PC, Xbox One Released 2013-09-17 Genre(s) Open-World, Action Developer(s) Rockstar North
Grand Theft Auto 5 was released in 2013 to tremendous audience and critical reception. The game is set in the fictional state of San Andreas with a large, busy map where players will assume the role of three distinct characters: Michael De Santa, Franklin Clinton, and Trevor Phillips.
Related
7 Open-World Games That Use Storytelling To Enhance Exploration When a lovingly crafted open world and well-written story are combined, it results in games that are a must play.
Grand Theft Auto Five was written by Dan Houser and Rupert Humphries, with Houser as an executive producer. Upon release, the game broke sales records and made over one billion dollars in its first three days, quickly becoming the second-best-selling game of all time. The game remains in Metacritic’s top ten highest-rated games of all time and is believed to be a must-play.
Red Dead Redemption 2 Metascore: 97
Red Dead Redemption 2 Platform(s) PS4, PC, Stadia, Xbox One Released 2018-10-26 Genre(s) Action, Adventure Developer(s) Rockstar Games
Red Dead Redemption 2 is the long-awaited third installment in the Red Dead series. It acts as a prequel to Red Dead Redemption and follows outlaw Arthur Morgan during the decline of the Wild West. The game was met with critical acclaim was nominated for Game of the Year at multiple awards shows, and won over twenty categories across the 2019 awards season.
Once again, Dan Houser was at the forefront of the writing alongside longtime collaborators Michael Unsworth and Rupert Humphries. It’s often championed as the culmination of Rockstar’s expansive history, cited as the best of the best in open-world gaming – and gaming as a whole. It was also praised for its brilliant and unpredictable story, which was claimed to be bold, complex, and original.
Grand Theft Auto 4 Metascore 98
Grand Theft Auto 4 Platform(s) PS3, Xbox 360, PC Released 2008-04-29 Genre(s) Action, Adventure Developer(s) Rockstar Games
Despite Rockstar Games’ immense repertoire, Grand Theft Auto 4 manages to stay atop the charts as one of Metacritic’s top three highest-rated games of all time. Outdone only by Ocarina of Time, GTA 4 is Rockstar Games’, and Dan Houser’s, absolute triumph of gaming.
Written by Houser and Rupert Humphries, GTA 4 follows veteran Niko Bellic, an Eastern European man who arrives in Liberty City to escape his past and the criminals who pursue him. Rockstar Games stated their investment in Liberty City was immensely detailed and original. Once again, the game received critical acclaim, particularly for the narrative and depth of the world.
Related
5 Great Open-World Games Set In Mundane Settings An open-world game doesn’t have to have an extraordinary environment to be good, as proven by these video games.

title: Modern PURAIR Barrie Revolutionizes Indoor Air Quality for Homes and Businesses | User | dailytimesleader.com
text:
Modern PURAIR is setting a new standard for indoor air quality in Barrie, Ontario, with its cutting-edge furnace, air duct, and vent cleaning services, along with comprehensive air quality testing. Serving both residential and commercial clients, the company delivers cleaner, healthier indoor environments. Barrie, Ontario - April 23, 2025 - Modern PURAIR, a leading provider of indoor air quality solutions, is transforming the way Barrie residents and businesses experience clean air. Through advanced furnace, air duct, and vent cleaning services, paired with expert indoor air quality testing, Modern PURAIR is committed to creating safer, healthier indoor environments across the region.
With indoor air pollution increasingly linked to health issues such as allergies, asthma, and respiratory infections, improving indoor air quality has never been more important. Modern PURAIR’s innovative equipment, certified technicians, and customer-first approach are helping to address these concerns with unmatched precision and professionalism.
Services Offered by Modern PURAIR Barrie:
Furnace & Duct Cleaning: Removal of dust, allergens, and contaminants to improve air circulation and HVAC efficiency.
Vent Cleaning: Targeted cleaning of bathroom, kitchen, and dryer vents to enhance safety and reduce fire risks.
Indoor Air Quality Testing: State-of-the-art testing to identify pollutants and recommend actionable solutions.
Commercial HVAC Cleaning: Scalable solutions for offices, retail spaces, and industrial environments to ensure clean air for employees and customers.
Filter Maintenance Programs: Ongoing support to help clients maintain optimal indoor air conditions year-round.
“At Modern PURAIR Barrie, we believe that clean air isn’t a luxury — it’s a necessity,” said Richard Turner, Owner of Modern PURAIR Barrie . “We’re proud to offer services that not only improve HVAC system performance but also contribute to healthier living and working environments.”
Why Customers Choose Modern PURAIR:
Certified and Trained Technicians: Every technician is thoroughly trained to deliver consistent, high-quality service.
Transparent Pricing: Upfront quotes with no hidden fees.
100% Satisfaction Guarantee: A commitment to excellence backed by a customer satisfaction promise.
Eco-Friendly Practices: Sustainable cleaning methods that protect both indoor air and the environment.
Clean Air Score Report™: A unique feature providing customers with real-time, measurable results on air quality improvements.
Modern PURAIR Barrie serves homeowners, property managers, and businesses throughout the Greater Barrie area, helping each client breathe easier through expert indoor air care. As part of a growing movement toward healthier buildings, the company is proud to be at the forefront of Canada’s indoor air quality revolution.
For more information about Modern PURAIR Barrie and their services, visit their website or contact Richard Turner at +1 705-300-4245.
About Modern PURAIR:
Modern PURAIR is Canada’s trusted name in indoor air quality, offering services from coast to coast. With a focus on furnace and air duct cleaning, vent cleaning, and air quality testing, Modern PURAIR helps create healthier spaces where Canadians live and work.

author: S24H
title: Exigen a la Junta mantener el maestro de apoyo en Infantil en el CEIP San Francisco de Ciudad Rodrigo
text:
Exigen a la Junta mantener el maestro de apoyo en Infantil en el CEIP San Francisco de Ciudad Rodrigo
Fernando Pablos defiende en las Cortes la necesidad de conservar cinco docentes en el centro, pese al descenso de matrículas, para garantizar la calidad educativa en zonas rurales
El PSOE de Salamanca ha registrado una iniciativa en las Cortes de Castilla y León para exigir a la Junta que rectifique y anule la supresión de dos plazas de maestro en el colegio San Francisco de Ciudad Rodrigo, medida comunicada recientemente por la Inspección Educativa.
El procurador socialista Fernando Pablos, firmante de la propuesta, respalda la postura de la comunidad educativa del centro, que acepta la pérdida de un docente por la reducción de matrícula en 3 años, pero rechaza de forma contundente la eliminación de la segunda plaza, correspondiente al maestro de apoyo en Educación Infantil.
Tanto el AMPA como las familias consideran este puesto esencial para garantizar una atención de calidad en una etapa tan delicada del desarrollo. Pablos subraya que el criterio de la Junta, que impide contar con maestro de apoyo cuando solo hay una línea, perjudica especialmente a las zonas rurales, donde esta situación es habitual.
La iniciativa socialista destaca además que la baja natalidad y la despoblación no deben conllevar una merma de recursos educativos, sino al contrario: deben compensarse con medidas que promuevan la igualdad y la cohesión territorial.
Por ello, el PSOE exige que durante el próximo curso se mantengan al menos cinco de las seis plazas actuales, destinando una al apoyo en Infantil, y recuerda que “aunque solo exista un aula, esta necesita apoyo, sea en un pueblo o en una ciudad”.

author: Alberta Cobb
title: Is 2023 the hottest summer?
text:
Is 2023 the hottest summer?
No, 2023 is not the hottest summer ever recorded. However, it is one of the hottest years on record.
Will 2023 be the hottest summer ever?
According to scientists at NASA’s Goddard Institute of Space Studies (GISS), 2023 is not predicted to be the hottest summer ever. Although it is expected to be a very warm year, the hottest summer on record is still under investigation.
Is 2023 the hottest year on record?
Based on global records since 1880, 2023 is projected to be among the hottest years ever recorded. However, the final data is still being analyzed to confirm if it will be the hottest year on record.
Will 2024 be hotter than 2023?
There is a possibility that 2024 will be slightly hotter than 2023, following the normal pattern. However, climate scientists warn that the normal pattern may no longer exist. In any case, 2024 is expected to be one of the hottest years on record.
Is 2023 predicted to be a hot summer?
Yes, the June-July-August (JJA) season in 2023 was the warmest on record globally by a significant margin. The average temperature during this summer season was well above average, indicating that 2023 will be a hot summer.
Report reveals Summer 2023 is the hottest on record
Based on the data, Summer 2023 is indeed the hottest on record. The temperatures during this period were unprecedented and broke previous records.
Is Europe having a heatwave 2023?
Yes, Europe experienced heatwaves in 2023, including one named the Cerberus Heatwave. This heatwave brought the hottest temperatures ever recorded in Europe, indicating the presence of a heatwave in the region.
Will Europe have a hot summer 2023?
Overall, summer 2023 saw a record number of days with extreme heat stress in southern Europe, although it was localized to specific areas. Additionally, European seas experienced above-average temperatures during this summer season.
Why has it been so hot lately 2023?
The recent increase in extreme heat can be attributed to the warming of Earth’s oceans. Human activities, such as the emission of greenhouse gases, have led to the warming of oceans worldwide, resulting in the hot temperatures we have experienced lately in 2023.
Is global warming getting worse 2023?
Reports from NOAA, Copernicus, the U.N., and the World Meteorological Organization indicate that global warming continues to worsen, and 2023 has been identified as the warmest year on record. The impacts of climate change are becoming more severe as a result.
Will summer 2025 be hot?
According to the World Meteorological Organization (WMO), there is a 90% chance that at least one of the next five years, including 2025, will be the hottest on record. Therefore, it is likely that summer 2025 will be hot, but the specific temperatures are yet to be determined.
What are the top 3 hottest years on record?
The top three hottest years on record, according to the UN agency, are 2016, 2019, and 2020. These years experienced global temperatures that were well above the average, indicating the severity of climate change.
What is the hottest place on Earth 2023?
Death Valley in the United States is known as the hottest place on Earth. It is characterized by extreme heat, and the Badwater Basin within Death Valley is the lowest point in North America.
What date was hottest 100 2023?
The Hottest 100 of 2023, hosted by triple j, took place on Saturday, January 27th. It showcased the most popular songs of the year as voted by the audience.
Is 2023 going to be a cold summer?
Based on the summer forecast for 2023, most of North America is expected to have near to above-normal temperatures. However, certain regions, such as the Rockies, Great Basin, and California coast, may experience cooler temperatures than average.
Will it be hot in 2050?
If greenhouse gas emissions continue at the current rate, global temperatures are projected to rise by about 1.5 degrees Celsius by 2050. This increase in temperature would result in significantly hotter conditions compared to the present.
Is it getting hotter every year?
Yes, on average, Earth’s temperature has been rising by approximately 0.14° Fahrenheit (0.08°C) per decade since 1880. This trend suggests that temperatures are increasing over time.
What is the hottest year on record?
While the final analysis is still ongoing, it is highly likely that 2023 will be one of the hottest years on record. Previous record-holders include 2016 and 2020, which experienced global temperatures well above the average.
How bad is global warming in 2050?
According to a climate scenario developed by NASA, if greenhouse gas emissions continue at the current rate, global warming could reach approximately 1.5 degrees Celsius by 2050. The consequences of this level of global warming could be significant, affecting various aspects of life, including potential risks to human health and the environment.
How hot will it get in 2030?
Based on current projections, global average temperatures are estimated to rise by 1.5 degrees Celsius (2.7 degrees Fahrenheit) above preindustrial levels around the first half of the 2030s. This increase is largely attributed to the continued burning of fossil fuels.
Is June 2023 the hottest month on record?
According to NASA’s global temperature analysis, June 2023 was the hottest June on record. The data collected from weather stations, research stations, ships, and ocean buoys confirmed this finding.
Are summers getting hotter?
Regional trends vary, but overall, the distribution of summer temperatures has shifted, resulting in hotter summers in many areas compared to the past. While not every summer is hotter, the frequency of hot summers has increased in many regions.
Is the UK due a heatwave 2023?
Based on the analysis from the UK Met Office, there was a high-pressure system bringing in a hot Tropical Continental Airmass in September 2023. This pressure pattern is often associated with heatwave conditions in the UK.
Is Europe getting colder or warmer?
Europe is experiencing a trend of warming temperatures that is happening at a faster rate than the global average. The mean annual temperature in Europe has increased significantly since the pre-industrial period.
How long does a heat wave last?
A heatwave is defined as a period of abnormally hot weather that lasts for more than two days. During a heatwave, temperatures are significantly higher than the average and can be accompanied by high humidity.
